channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2532] Official Digg iPhone App [pics/download link]
item.description: Keep up with the latest popular content on the web with Digg's official iPhone app!

item.title: [+2495] Do you know the victim's name?
[+2370] Suck it NASA! These [PICS] are 99% Cheaper than Yours
item.description: A man with a cheap digital camera, a helium balloon and some duct tape managed to get these stunning space pics for just $750. NASA spends millions of dollars getting similar shots of Earth.

item.title: [+2058] 11 Things You Didn't Know About Shawshank Redemption
item.description: The Shawshank Redemption is a timeless story of hope, friendship, and, of course, imprisonment. Like any cult film, there is a rabid army of Shawshank fans online debating the correct pronunciation of Zihuatanejo and unearthing obscure film facts.

item.title: [+1985] This Is Why People Hate the Phone Company, AT&T
item.description: A femtocell is a device whose sole purpose is to help fill gaps in wireless networks. Instead of using it as a way to turn unhappy customers into happy customers, AT&T is treating the femtocell as another way to squeeze their already victimized customer for even more $$$

item.title: [+1643] Bush wipes hand on Clinton's shirt after shaking hands
item.description: BBC aired video of Bush and Clinton’s visit, and Mediate noticed that at one point, Bush appeared to wipe his hand off on Clinton’s shirt after shaking hands with a crowd of Haitians

item.title: [+1250] EXCLUSIVE: GoDaddy to Stop Registering Domains in China
item.description: At least one company is ready to follow Google's stance on doing business in China: GoDaddy.

item.title: [+1186] Palin tells followers to 'reload' and 'aim for' Democrats
item.description: Since the passage of health care reform, there has been increasingly violent language from opponents, along with vandalism directed at Democratic members of Congress. Sarah Palin has now done her part to raise the rhetorical intensity, telling her Twitter followers, "Commonsense Conservatives & lovers of America: 'Don't Retreat, Instead - RELOAD!'"

item.title: [+1078] Zero Punctuation : Battlefield: Bad Company 2
item.description: This week, Zero Punctuation reviews Battlefield: Bad Company 2.

item.title: [+934] Digg's iPhone app (finally) here - win a custom Digg iPad
item.description: We are very excited to announce the launch of Digg's official app for the iPhone. This free app was designed to create a seamless browsing experience between Digg and the most popular content on the web, as chosen by the Digg community.

item.title: [+827] Incredible Staircase Designs [PICS]
item.description: Sometimes architects can get a bit carried away. These staircase designs are truly incredible.

item.title: [+804] Good-Bye IE 6
item.description: I hereby officially proclaim Internet Explorer 6 to be a dead browser walking. Even though IE 6 still somehow manages to keep 19.8% of the Web browser market, IE 6 is a late Web browser! It's a stiff! Bereft of life, it rests in peace!

item.title: [+797] Pwn2Own Hack Topples Firefox on Windows
item.description: The first day of the Pwn2Own hacker challenge wrapped up with a familiar face going after a familiar target. And, for the second year in a row, a German hacker known simply as “Nils” exploited a previously unknown vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox to take complete control of a 64-bit Windows 7 machine.

item.title: [+780] Opera Mini for iPhone submitted, you must see the video!
item.description: How many pages of the New York times can you load in Opera Mini vs. Safari on the same phone? Watch and find out.

item.title: [+722] More Bees Still Mysteriously Disappearing
item.description: Without bees, it's kind of game over. They're doing more than you think.

item.title: [+719] FBI Investigating Cut Gas Line At Home Of Dem Rep's Brother
item.description: After a tea party organizer published the address of the brother of Rep. Tom Perriello (D-VA) in a blog post urging anti-health reform activists to "drop by", someone cut a propane gas line at the house, Politico is reporting.

item.title: [+703] Attention FAIL
item.description: I wonder if this guy even knows he's on TV?

item.title: [+655] Bill Murray Bartending at Shangri-La during SXSW 2010 [Vid]
item.description: Everyone gets tequila, regardless of their order.

item.title: [+651] Dead cat comes back to life' 9 months after owner buries him
item.description: The Petrillo family were devastated when their ginger tom Alfie was run over and killed last June - and astonished when he reappeared this month, fit and well.Dead cat comes back to life' 9 months after owner buries him.
